metadata.title: CVE-2018-6152 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The implementation of the Page.downloadBehavior backend unconditionallymarked downloaded files as safe, regardless of file type in Google Chromeprior to 66.0.3359.117 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to installa malicious extension to potentially perform a sandbox escape via a craftedHTML page and user interaction.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
